org.ingatan.data
Class QuizHistoryFile

java.lang.Object
  org.ingatan.data.QuizHistoryFile

public class QuizHistoryFile
extends java.lang.Object

Quiz history including a record for each time a quiz has been entered, the result, and how many questions were asked/skipped and also what libraries were included.

Version:
1.0
Author:
ThomasEveringham

Method Detail

getTotalScore

public int getTotalScore()
Get the total score accumlated over all quizes.

Returns:
the total score accumulated over all quizes that have been undertaken.

addToTotalScore

public void addToTotalScore(int increment)
Adds the specified amount to the total running score.

Parameters:
increment - the amount by which the total score should be increased.

addNewEntry

public void addNewEntry(java.lang.String date,
                        int percentage,
                        int questionsAnswered,
                        int questionsSkipped,
                        int score,
                        java.lang.String librariesUsed)
Adds a new history entry.

Parameters:
date - the date the quiz was taken.
percentage - the percentage awarded for the quiz.
questionsAnswered - the total number of questions answered during the quiz.
questionsSkipped - the number of questions skipped in the quiz.
score - the total score awarded for this quiz.
librariesUsed - the libraries used in this quiz.

removeEntry

Remove the specified entry from the array list.

Parameters:
entry - the entry to remove.

all history entried contained by this file.
